website_summaries.verdict: Make single cups of coffee with your favorite K-Cups or with coffee grounds all in one easy-to-use unit.
pros: Includes a reusable K-Cup adapter that works with both regular K-Cups and 2.0 K-Cups and a Brew Cup adapter to brew coffee with regular grounds
Brew in 3 different sizes – 6 ounces, 10 ounces, and 15 ounces
All of the adapters are dishwasher safe
cons: Some buyers had grounds get into their drinks
You also need to make sure the unit is plugged into an outlet on its own and not sharing with another appliance

customer_reviews.title: Works well, great price
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for making single cups of coffee in the evening if the big coffee maker is empty. Works great. The only problem was that the instructions were a little confusing. The trick is that you always have to hit the pre-heat (lower button) first, before hitting the brew button.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bella coffeemaker - just right!
customer_reviews.text: It works, at a fraction of the cost of a Keurig. Great for my solo 1-cup in the morning coffee need. I don't mind having to measure out the water each time, as I don't like the idea of water continuously sitting in the reservoir, anyway, as with a fancier machine. My one complaint so far is that it is quite noisy at the end of the cycle, so if someone else is sleeping nearby, beware - they may wake up!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Landy

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great price compared to the rest of the market. It does spit a bit, so it's important to raise the cup platform for a regular cup. And, don't remove the cup too soon as it tends to drip a bit after the initial filling.
customer_reviews.author: cactusflower

customer_reviews.title: This is not a good product.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great for about 3 weeks. We used bottled water with it and a myriad of different K-Cups. Similarly to other reviewers, our single serve started serving about 1 ounce of product per "run".
customer_reviews.author: Nun Ya

customer_reviews.title: particular on k cups used
customer_reviews.text: Works well with the original non- recyclable k cups but not with the recycling ones as the type of cover on the cups blocks the water tubes.
customer_reviews.author: E. Golden

customer_reviews.title: Best of both Worlds
customer_reviews.text: I have had a Bella One Cup for years. Well actually ... Two units.. One for Coffee and the other exclusively for brewed Tea. They have been very good units and I packed them carefully away as spares. This dual brew one cup is even better. Now for a fraction of the cost I can enjoy the k-cups too... I had a good laugh reading the reviews about it being messy. Yes the Brew Grounds adapter can drip when removed... So.. Now I have Two Dual Brews .. One for Coffee and the other for brewed Tea.....
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: K-Cups blow out
customer_reviews.text: I was disapointed when the K-Cups blew out giving me a cup of grounds. Tried 6 cups and that was enough to make me return the unit. Amazon was great and made it easy to return. Don't know if all units will do this so if you get a good one then great. I liked the size and ease of operation as well as a small footprint on my countertop. I used the Keurig Green Mountain brand K-Cup and maybe a different brand of cup may work...or not. One should be aware at least.
customer_reviews.author: DMZ

customer_reviews.title: While following instructions for cleaning prior to use, I ...
customer_reviews.text: While following instructions for cleaning prior to use, I filled the reservoir with water and waited for it to preheat. As it approached the temperature to brew, the water began boiling over the top of the reservoir so that the coffeemaker was in a pool of water. It then proceeded to brew and stopped in the middle of the brew cycle so that the cup was half full. Thinking I did something wrong, I tried it, not once, but twice more with the same results. I don't know if there was something wrong with the unit sent to me or if all of the units do this, but I was very dis appointed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Basket makes a great cup too
customer_reviews.text: Fits tall travel mugs (OXO) and has two brew speeds. One for PODS and one for the Basket which is included. The basket brew (lower button) brews a little more slowly and with a refillable pod makes stronger coffee. I fill my pod then tamp it down lightly. This speed and method eliminates the problem of the grounds being pushed aside by the force of the water and so more complete brewing. Basket makes a great cup too.Like other non-resevoir machines one has to wait for the water to heat before it brews, but unless you don't have an extra three minutes and like spending a lot more money, this brewer is great.

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED
